eu.mf2c.pm.security

Class StoreManagerSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.mf2c.pm.security.StoreManagerSingleton

  • public class StoreManagerSingleton
extends Object
    A singleton class responsible for the trust and key stores. On application close down, the stores are written to a local file.

    Author:
    Shirley Crompton, shirley.crompton@stfc.ac.uk org Data Science and Technology Group, UKRI Science and Technology Council Date 10 Apr 2018

      • storeCertificate

        public void storeCertificate(String alias,
                             X509Certificate cert)
                      throws StoreManagerSingletonException
        Store a X.509 certificate with the alias.

        Parameters:
        alias - A String representation of the certificate alias
        cert - An X.509 certificate
        Throws:
        StoreManagerSingletonException - if certificate is null or on storing the certificate

      • storeKeyEntry

        public void storeKeyEntry(String alias,
                          String fogID,
                          X509Certificate cert)
                   throws KeyStoreException
        Store a X.509 certificate, along with its alias, the private key and the certificate chain.

        Parameters:
        alias - A String representation of the certificate alias
        fogID - A String representation of the ID of the target fog
        cert - The certificate associated with the private key for the entry.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - On error storing the key entry.

      • getKeyEntry

        public KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry getKeyEntry(String alias,
                                            String fogID)
                                     throws Exception
        Retrieve a keystore entry by the provided alias.

        Parameters:
        alias - the entry alias
        fogID - the fog identity which forms part of the entry passphrase
        Returns:
        the retrieved
        Throws:
        Exception - if the specified entry is not a PrivateKeyEntry or an incorrect passphrase is provided

      • createTrustStore

        public void createTrustStore()
                      throws StoreManagerSingletonException
        Create a TrustStore using the predefined file name. If the file exists, load it. Else, create a new one and write it to file. The method also loads the bundled certificate PEMs to the store.

        Throws:
        StoreManagerSingletonException - on error creating the keystore or on loading the certificate PEMs.

      • createKeyStore

        public void createKeyStore()
                    throws StoreManagerSingletonException
        Create a KeyStore using the predefined file name. If the file exists, load it. Else, create a new one and write it to file.

        Throws:
        StoreManagerSingletonException - on error creating the keystore.
